name: Living Well Center for Integrative Health
address: 1475 Mountain View Rd, Essex Junction, VT 05452
description: Offers aquatic therapy as part of their integrative health services, focusing on exercises in warm water to aid in lymphatic drainage, reduce swelling, and relieve pain

name: Battenkill Aquatics & Physical Therapy
description: Provides aquatic therapy using a warm water therapy pool to help with rehabilitation for various disabilities, offering exercises in standing, sitting, walking, swimming, and floating positions

name: University of Vermont Health Network (Various Locations)
address: Multiple locations including Middlebury, Winooski, and Berlin
description: Offers aquatic physical therapy at several locations, utilizing therapy pools to reduce pressure on joints and muscles, ideal for individuals with balance issues, pain, or low endurance

name: Mt. Ascutney Hospital and Health Center (Miller Therapeutic Pool)
description: Features the Miller Therapeutic Pool, the only rehabilitation pool of its kind in Vermont, offering aquatic therapy in a 92-93 degree Fahrenheit pool for various rehabilitation needs

name: PRIORI Pool (Part of Aquatic Therapy Services)
address: Information not available (located in Essex Junction, VT based on context)
description: Utilizes an innovative "PRIORI Pool" for aquatic therapy, featuring specialized treatment stations and a UV filter system, maintaining a therapeutic temperature of 88-92°F
